name: Cloudian Storm Rains
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Cloudian" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand except "Cloudian Storm Rains". When you Normal Summon a "Cloduian" monster: You can place 1 Fog counter on all monsters you control. If this face-up card would be destroyed you can remove 2 Fog counters from the field instead. You can only activate 1 "Cloudian Storm Rains" per turn.
